description:
Ever wonder what it would be like within the confines of a cosmic voyager? Together with the main character Rish, you have to leave the spacecraft in 5 minutes only and go on a long journey, full of challenges and clever puzzles. The mission starts out easy and gets more & more difficult as your skill level improves. Will you survive? Everything depends only on YOU!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Description

Can you imagine suddenly finding yourself in a spaceship? you don't even know what planet you are on! because you are stuck in this strange place. You will hear the ticking of the clock, and it gets louder every second, but there is no physical clock or alarm around you. What a suspicious thing!. The clock makes you strained and afraid. What will happen when the sound ends? will you die or will you explode?. Suddenly you hear the voice of someone addressing you saying "get out of the complex" with a sarcastic laugh! What he means by complexity. Why the sound is like your brother's sound!

You'll start looking for a way out and you will start following the sound of the clock? You will think it is leading you to the exit but at each step, you will face a different obstacle. Suddenly you find that there is a door locked with a laser and there are some suggestions on the walls. You'll start thinking, "Are the tips to help me or to destroy me"?. But you will have to do them because there is no other option. You will pass the first obstacle and you will find another obstacle followed by the sound of a sarcastic laugh!

Suddenly you will find there is a watch in your hand indicating the twenty-fifth hour! How is this and the days consist of only 24 hours! you'll start screaming, am I in another world or what? Suddenly you will open your eyes and find that you are really was in the other world!. All this was a dream, or what is called "afternoon dreams". The sound of the clock was your alarm and the person talking to you was your brother trying to wake you up because you were screaming. The sound of laughter is the sound of the rest of your family laughing at your cries.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Criteria 

  • Innovation-> The innovation in the 25:00 game is the story itself, combining time, space, puzzles, and a lot of unexpected things.
  • Fun->  25:00 is really fun! It has enough suspense to play it for seven straight hours! Because first, the player will be eager to see what the end of the game is, where he is and how he got here. Also, the many different challenges will make the game really cool! 
  • Theme->  The time has many aspects in 25:00, first the dream and how the dream is actually a few seconds, but the player will feel that it is hours and hours. Second, the hidden clock sounds that increase and decrease, which will make the player feel that there is time to time out, but in fact, there is no.
  • Graphics->  You will see by yourself the quality of the graphics that have been made in Unreal Engine!
  • Sound->  Sound of people laughing, the voice of unknown people giving the player instructions as well as the sound of music are all unique features.
  • Humor->  We focused on making  25:00 an action and thriller game with a funny story, in addition to funny sounds, laughers, and instructions that contain a kind of irony and humor.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Trivia

25:00 has been inspired by many voyage movies, particularly Passengers. The protagonists in the movie have to save the spaceship from catastrophic engine failure and save their lives on board.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

What to expect

  • Try to escape from a rocket before getting dead in space.
  • Use your intellect and wits to solve puzzles and decipher clues.
  • See how you perform under pressure before you're lost amongst the stars.
  • Challenge yourself in a high-adrenaline scenario.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Features

  • A great variety of puzzles.
  • Excellent graphics.
  • Ability to SKIP levels.
  • Thrilling twists throughout this full journey.
  • A fascinating plot.
  • Try to find the riddling hidden objects.
  • Family Entertaining is suitable for all ages.
  • Having step by step hint facility.
  • All levels are FREE.
  • Play WITHOUT ADS.

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Hints

Collect objects having the number 25, to give you hints when you are stuck.

Are you ready to immerse yourself in the exciting world of space quests, puzzles, and mini-games?

Pass the levels, watch the fascinating story unveil, and most importantly... DON'T GET LOST!

_______________________________________________________________________________________________

Controls

KeyFunctionSpaceJumpWMove ForwardSMove BackwardALeftDRightLeft-click + Move cursorPlayer EyeEHandle/Hold
